transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_005581.4 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000270233.10. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.

transcript.name: t2
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001013257.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000611077.4. The two transcripts differ at the 3'UTR.

source.name: ISBT Working Party on Red Cell Immunogenetics and Blood Group Terminology

contact.name: Jill Storry
contact.address: Department of Laboratory Medicine, Division of Hematology and Transfusion Medicine, Lund University, Sweden
